# <a name="read-receipts"></a><span data-ttu-id="9ad56-102">Potvrde čitanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ad56-102">Read receipts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ad56-103">Da biste zatražili pročitana ili isporučena za vašu poruku:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ad56-103">To request a read receipt or a delivery receipt for your message:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="9ad56-104">Izaberite tri tačke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ad56-104">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="9ad56-105">Sastavite okno na vrhu poruke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ad56-105">at the top of the message compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="9ad56-106">Izaberite stavku **Prikaži opcije poruke**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ad56-106">Select **Show message options**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="9ad56-107">Izaberite stavku **Zahtevaj potvrdu čitanja** **zatraži potvrdu prijema**ili oboje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ad56-107">Select **Request a read receipt** or **Request a delivery receipt**, or both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ad56-108">Da biste odabrali kako Outlook odgovara za čitanje prijema zahteva, idite na</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ad56-108">To choose how Outlook responds to read receipt requests, go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="9ad56-109">**Postavke** > **sve Outlook postavke prikaza** > **Rukovanje porukama**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ad56-109">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Message handling**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9ad56-110">Za više informacija, pogledajte [potvrde čitanja u programu Outlook na Webu](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9ad56-110">For more information, see [Read receipts in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span></span>
